name: auto-tab-groups
description: Cross-browser extension that automatically groups tabs by domain
author: Nitzan Papini

scripts.build:chrome: shx cp src/manifest.chrome.json src/manifest.json && web-ext build --source-dir src --artifacts-dir src/web-ext-artifacts --ignore-files "manifest.*.json" ".DS_Store" --overwrite-dest && shx mv src/web-ext-artifacts/*.zip auto-tab-groups-chrome.zip && shx rm src/manifest.json && shx echo "Chrome extension built: auto-tab-groups-chrome.zip"
scripts.build:firefox: shx cp src/manifest.firefox.json src/manifest.json && web-ext build --source-dir src --artifacts-dir src/web-ext-artifacts --ignore-files "manifest.*.json" ".DS_Store" --overwrite-dest && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path'),v=require('./package.json').version,d='src/web-ext-artifacts';const z=fs.readdirSync(d).find(f=>f.endsWith('.zip'));if(!z){console.error('No build zip found');process.exit(1)}fs.renameSync(p.join(d,z),p.join(d,`auto-tab-groups-firefox-${v}.xpi`));" && shx rm src/manifest.json && node -e "console.log('Firefox extension built: auto-tab-groups-firefox-' + require('./package.json').version + '.xpi')"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.dev:chrome: shx cp src/manifest.chrome.json src/manifest.json && shx echo "Chrome manifest ready for development - load src/ folder in chrome://extensions/"
scripts.dev:firefox: shx cp src/manifest.firefox.json src/manifest.json && shx echo "Firefox manifest ready for development - load src/ folder in about:debugging"
scripts.dev:clean: shx rm -f src/manifest.json && shx echo "Development manifest cleaned"
scripts.code:check: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.code:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
